promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word pokemon name for a chibi cute special deer fire-type wearing ornate armor. It can be found in volcano-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or fire. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Volcora, a chibi cute special deer fire-type pokemon. It can be found in volcano-like environments It has the following abilities: flame-burst, screech. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word deer or fire or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, deer-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, blue and red ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Volcora lives in volcanic regions and has a fiery spirit. Its screeches sound like songs and its flame-bursts keep all other pokemon away.
